name: Jam STAPL Byte-Code File
summary: Learn about .JBC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JBC files store the data required for programming devices in a JTAG chain. The JBC format enables the STAPL format to be compressed into a compact binary format.

description: A JBC file contains data saved in the Jam STAPL (Standard Test and Programming Language) Byte-Code format. It is compiled from a .JAM file into a binary representation.
